seed_pair.target: I heard that you're going to to pay for a new bed.
seed_pair.known: Oí que vas a pagar por una cama nueva.

S0504: voy a correr | a través del césped | voy a correr a través del césped
I'm going to run | across the grass | I'm going to run across the grass
S0505: para que no | me quede atrás | para que no me quede atrás
so that I don't | I get left behind | so that I don't get left behind
S0506: solía vivir | por aquí | hace años | antes de que nos mudáramos | hace años antes de que nos mudáramos
I used to live | around here | years ago | before we moved | years ago before we moved
S0508: no tiene sentido | preocuparse por | cómo vas a pagar | vas a pagar | preocuparse por cómo vas a pagar
there's no point | worrying about | how you're going to to pay | you're going to to pay | worrying about how you're going to to pay
